name: Chatsy
description:
Make choices fast, because your stress level is rising. 

Hit the target number of friends before the program decides to use you instead.

If it's too much trouble, buy perks and improve yourself.

Chatsy and all associated with it are not responsible for any loss of souls. 

Chatsy, the perfect program for meeting new people.

For Area of Effect Game Jam 2020

Theme: Message Received
